description: The Ballerina Serviceberry (Amelanchier x grandiflora 'Ballerina') is an amazing plant with plenty of reasons to admire it! It produces white, star-like flowers in the spring and purplish-black berries in the summer. The berries are edible and have a unique flavor. The foliage of this deciduous shrub features beautiful green leaves, which turn to a vibrant yellow and orange color in the fall for a stunning display. Ballerina Serviceberry is low-maintenance, easy to grow, and can tolerate a wide range of soils and climates. Its upright, well-rounded form grows up to 10 feet tall and wide and makes a great addition to your landscape. This is an ideal choice for adding four-season interest and beauty to your garden!
